snippet.title: Virtual Villagers: New Believers Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Free: http://www.gamefools.com/pc-games/virtual-villagers-new-believers.html

Explore the center of Isola in this innovative chapter of the Virtual Villagers series, while you reckon with a band of mysterious masked heathens who do not believe in you. Guide your tribe as they attempt to convert the savages, by dismantling their precious totems and removing their hideous masks. Unleash your incredible godly powers to impress the new believers and secure their complete devotion. Featuring perplexing puzzles and intense island events, dozens of achievements, and new surprises every time you play, Virtual Villagers: New Believers is sure to impress.
